name: Temu
title: temu.com
shortDescription: Temu is an online marketplace that connects global sellers with local buyers, offering a wide range of products at competitive prices. It is designed for consumers looking for variety and affordability. An example use case is a shopper looking for budget-friendly fashion items that are not available in local stores.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: AliExpress
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers a wide range of products internationally.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Wish
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on low-cost goods with a mobile-first approach.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: eBay
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Provides a platform for both new and used goods.
